title: Admin User Detail Page
description: Create admin user detail page showing full profile, order history, account actions, and activity timeline

objective.i_want: to view complete user details and order history
objective.so_that: I can provide customer support and manage accounts effectively

acceptance_criteria.description: Page displays user profile card with avatar, name, email, phone
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock useAdminUser hook, verify profile card rendered

acceptance_criteria.description: Page shows loading spinner while fetching user
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Set isLoading=true in mock, verify spinner visible

acceptance_criteria.description: Page shows error state for non-existent user
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock 404 response, verify error message displayed

acceptance_criteria.description: Profile card shows registration date and account status
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Verify createdAt and status displayed in card

acceptance_criteria.description: Admin badge shown if user is admin
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock user with isAdmin=true, verify badge visible

acceptance_criteria.description: Stats section shows order count, total spent, last order date
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Verify stats section displays correct values

acceptance_criteria.description: Order history table shows user's orders with status, date, total
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock orders array, verify table rendered

acceptance_criteria.description: Click order row navigates to order detail page
Addresses section shows user's saved addresses
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Mock addresses array, verify addresses displayed

acceptance_criteria.description: Action buttons for Make Admin / Remove Admin
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Click button, verify role mutation called

acceptance_criteria.description: Action button for Deactivate / Reactivate account
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Click button, verify status mutation called

acceptance_criteria.description: Confirmation modal before role or status changes
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Click action, verify confirmation modal appears
Complete action, verify appropriate toast shown

acceptance_criteria.description: Back button navigates to users list
Page is fully RTL with Hebrew labels
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Verify dir='rtl' and Hebrew text for all labels
Verify responsive layout on different screen sizes

hooks: useAdminUser - fetch single user with details
useUpdateUserRole - mutation to change admin status

test_categories.name: Loading State
examples: should show loading spinner while fetching
should hide loading after fetch completes

test_categories.name: Error State
examples: should show error for non-existent user
should show error on fetch failure

test_categories.name: Profile Display
examples: should display user name and email
should show admin badge for admins

test_categories.name: Order History
examples: should show order details in rows
should navigate to order on click

test_categories.name: Actions
examples: should show make admin button for users
should show remove admin button for admins
should call role mutation on confirm

safety.rollback_plan: Delete new admin user detail components and page files
